name: Ereshkigal's Messenger VN
description:
Content warning: Mild nudity and death. 

A story about what it's like to be the messenger of the queen of the dead and your quest to keep her happy to avoid a zombie-apocalypse. 

________________________________________________________________________________

Made with Unity 2020, Fungus and Adobe Photoshop. 

________________________________________________________________________________

Images are taken from the internet (Google, Pinterest, ArtStation) but edited by myself. 

Sound effects are taken from Freesound

Background music: chill lofi middle eastern music vibes for studying, relaxing, working, hookah, arabic oud (2 hours) - YouTube

Strangely, some voice overs aren't working. :( 

There are 3 endings to this game.
